i.name: Reign of Anger
i.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

q.name: Cull the Meek
q.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

w.name: Ruthless Predator
w.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

e.name: Slice and Dice
e.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

r.name: Dominus
r.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

i1.blurb: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Renekton''' generates {{tip|fury|{{as|5 Fury}}}} each time he lands a [[basic attack]] on an enemy, losing {{tip|fury|{{as|4 Fury}}}} per second if he hasn't dealt or taken damage in the last 12 seconds.
When at/above {{as|50 Fury}}, '''Renekton's''' next [[Champion ability|basic ability]] consumes {{as|50 Fury}} to enhance its effects (does not generate Fury).
{{sbc|Reign of Anger:}} '''Renekton''' gains 50% more Fury from all sources while {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
i1.name: Reign of Anger
notes: * ''Renekton'' generates Fury by collecting [[Health Relic (Howling Abyss)|Health Relics]] on {{tip|Howling Abyss}} (interacts with ''Reign of Anger's'' bonus generation).

riot.name: Reign of Anger
riot.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

riot.name: Cull the Meek
riot.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
riot.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

q1.blurb: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton''' deals {{tip|physical damage|{{As|physical damage}}}} to all nearby enemies, gaining {{tip|fury|{{As|{{fd|2.5}} Fury}}}} as well as {{sti|healing}} himself for each unit hit.
Against champions, the Fury generated is quadrupled and the healing is tripled.
{{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} ''Cull the Meek'' deals additional damage and triples both the healing and its cap.
q1.name: Cull the Meek
notes: * ''Cull the Meek'' has a {{fd|0.25}} seconds cast time and does not interrupt ''Renekton's'' previous orders.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Cull the Meek's'' healing cap.

riot.name: Ruthless Predator
riot.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
riot.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total).

Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.

w1.blurb: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton's''' next basic attack within 7 seconds gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and strikes his target twice (each hit applies [[on-hit effect]]s and grants Fury) dealing {{As|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}} grants {{tip|fury|{{As|10 bonus Fury}}}}.
{{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} ''Ruthless Predator'' strikes '''Renekton's''' target 3 times, dealing 50% additional damage and increasing the stun duration to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Hit|{{ap|5 to 45}} {{as|(+ 75% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|5*2 to 45*2}} {{as|(+ 150% AD)}}}}
w1.name: Ruthless Predator
notes: * ''Ruthless Predator'' has a {{tt|{{fd|0.5}} seconds|Estimated}} cast time during which ''Renekton'' cannot perform any actions (can use [[summoner spell]]s as well as [[active ability items]]).
** ''Ruthless Predator's'' cast time can be dual cast with active ability items that play one of their own  ({{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Crescent}}).
** ''Ruthless Predator's'' cast time can be canceled with {{ais|Dominus|Renekton}}.

riot.name: Slice and Dice
riot.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
riot.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e0 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

e1.blurb: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
description:
{{sbc|First Cast - Slice:}} '''Renekton''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies he passes through and generating {{tip|Fury}}
(2 per non-champion, 10 per champion) for each unit hit.
Hitting an enemy allows '''Renekton''' to cast ''Dice'' within the next 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Second Cast - Dice:}} '''Renekton''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|''Slice's'' physical damage}} to all enemies he passes through and generating {{tip|Fury}}
(2 per non-champion, 10 per champion) for each unit hit.
{{sbc|{{ai|Reign of Anger|Renekton}}:}} ''Dice'' deals additional damage to all enemies and reduces their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Enhanced Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 250}} {{as|(+ 135% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Enhanced Damage|{{ap|40+70 to 160+250}} {{as|(+ 225% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|armor}}}}
e1.name: Slice and Dice
notes: * Movement speed has no significant to no impact on the dash speed.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Renekton'' can cast ''Dice'' even if ''Slice'' is blocked.

riot.name: Dominus
riot.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
riot.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health and {{ e6 }} Fury. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains {{ e4 }} Fury per second.

r1.blurb: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Renekton''' empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}, increased size, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and {{tip|fury|{{as|20 Fury}}}}.
For the duration, he deals {{tip|magic damage|{{As|magic damage}}}} each half second to all nearby enemies and generates {{tip|fury|{{as|5 Fury}}}} per second (total 75).
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half Second|{{ap|20 to 60 3}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*30 to 60*30 3}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Dominus
notes: * ''Dominus' ''range increase does not stack with {{ai|Ruthless Predator|Renekton}}.
* ''Dominus' ''cooldown starts on-cast (is not refunded if ''Renekton'' is killed during the cast animation).
* ''Dominus' ''bonus health gain does not interact with {{ii|Spirit Visage}} or {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
** ''Renekton'' retains ''Dominus' ''bonus health (if not over his normal maximum) once the duration ends.
